column4: The CD/DVD thing only gives a burn option, that uses the entire disk, CD-R,CD-RW or DVD-RW , I understand the burn part, but I have also used BeOS to transfer data between machines. That had a Write Option.
Maybe rsync is the route I need to look at more?
for me, i'm using Gnome baker.
Thank you, that is most likely the right way, I was using whatever default was in 9.04, getting Gnomebaker now, Thank you all.
